content.query:
USE sales_ldw;
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.dim_employee') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_employee;	

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_employee(    
    [EmployeeKey] [int],
	[ParentEmployeeKey] [int],
	[EmployeeNationalIDAlternateKey] [nvarchar](15),
	[ParentEmployeeNationalIDAlternateKey] [nvarchar](15),
	[SalesTerritoryKey] [int],
	[FirstName] [nvarchar](50),
	[LastName] [nvarchar](50),
	[MiddleName] [nvarchar](50),
	[NameStyle] [bit],
	[Title] [nvarchar](50),
	[HireDate] [date],
	[BirthDate] [date],
	[LoginID] [nvarchar](256),
	[EmailAddress] [nvarchar](50),
	[Phone] [nvarchar](25),
	[MaritalStatus] [nchar](1),
	[EmergencyContactName] [nvarchar](50),
	[EmergencyContactPhone] [nvarchar](25),
	[SalariedFlag] [bit],
	[Gender] [nchar](1),
	[PayFrequency] [tinyint],
	[BaseRate] [money],
	[VacationHours] [smallint],
	[SickLeaveHours] [smallint],
	[CurrentFlag] [bit],
	[SalesPersonFlag] [bit],
	[DepartmentName] [nvarchar](50),
	[StartDate] [date],
	[EndDate] [date],
	[Status] [nvarchar](50),
	[EmployeePhoto] [varbinary](max))
WITH ( 
        LOCATION = 'dim_files/DimEmployee.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = psv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/dim_employee'
    );

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.dim_employee;
